doctor_utters: [ask] How may I help you today?
[ask] Do you have shortness of breath?
[ask] Do you have chest pain or tightness?
[ask] Do you have a productive cough with yellow or green sputum?
[ask] Do you have a dry cough?
[ask] Have you been exposed to any environmental irritants such as smoke, dust, or pollen?
[ask] Have you been in contact with people with similar symptoms in the past 2 weeks?
[ask] Do you have any other symptoms such as wheezing, chest tightness, or difficulty breathing?
[inform] Based on your description, the most likely diagnosis is Allergic sinusitis.
patient_utters: Yes, I live in a big city and I am more likely to develop common allergies than the general population. I also have close family members who suffer from allergies (any type), hay fever, or eczema, and family members who have asthma.
Yes, I have nasal congestion or a clear runny nose and my nose or the back of my throat is itchy.
